page.title: 13TOURISM SURVEY (1)
page.content:
This survey was undertaken by 3rd. Year pupils from Grainville School interviewing people at{Gorey Harbour and{Gorey Village.
Of the people interviewed 116 were visitors and 20 were local residents. The reason for the greater number of visitors is that this is an important {tourist area.}The interviews were conducted at the end of June which is nearing the peak of the tourist season. The visitors came from a variety of places ranging from England to Sweden, Austria, Holland and Canada.The greatest number came from London, Surrey and Scotland followed by Somerset, Hampshire and Northern England.
